column5: Private Master Suite with own master bath/separate shower is the larger of the 2 bedrooms.  Queen size cool memory foam, dresser. Access to entire apartment except second master suite.   2 separate onsite gym/pool/recreation areas. Key fob access to locked/secure building, gate code access for guest.  This place is set up and can accommodate a long-term stay.  Across the street from Central Market, local restaurants and close to ammenties.
